args.natural_language_statement: Let A : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù^m be a linear operator. Prove that A is differentiable at every x ‚àà ‚Ñù^n and DA(x) is equal to A (as a linear map).

retrieved_examples.nl: If f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù^m is linear then f is differentiable everywhere and its derivative is f itself.

variable {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F]

theorem linear_hasFDerivAt {f : E ‚Üí‚Çó[‚Ñù] F} : ‚àÄ x, HasFDerivAt (f : E ‚Üí F) f x := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- If A : R^n ‚Üí R^m is a continuous linear map, then A is differentiable everywhere and its derivative at any point is A itself. -/

variable (n m : ‚Ñï)

theorem linear_map_differentiable_at (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) (x : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) :
  HasFDerivAt (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) A x := by sorry

theorem linear_map_differentiable_everywhere (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) :
  ‚àÄ x : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, HasFDerivAt (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) A x := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- If A : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù^m is a continuous linear map, then A is differentiable everywhere and its derivative at any point is A itself. -/

theorem linear_map_hasFDerivAt {n m : ‚Ñï} (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) (x : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) :
  HasFDerivAt (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) A x := by sorry

theorem linear_map_hasFDerivAt_univ {n m : ‚Ñï} (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) :
  ‚àÄ x : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, HasFDerivAt (A : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí (Fin m ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) A x := by sorry
